txt.en: 'Neglect your sapling this day. Instead focus on the creatures that would be its ally. The lurkers on the woods of Hithlad. Hunt them and eradicate them.'
With the lurkers defeated you should return to Cinaid and tell them of your efforts.
Cinaid wants you to eliminate creatures of nature that the Free People have suddenly found an interest in so they are deprived of whatever material the creatures possess.
'You will see the wisdom in this attack. The natural order must be broken wherever it attempts to assert itself.'
Cinaid suggested you go to Hithlad and destroy creatures of nature there. Slaughter potential would-be allies to your sapling.
